name: MusicPlayer.State
desc: An object that exposes the observable properties of a music player.

items.name: var objectWillChange: AnyPublisher<Void, Never>
items.desc: A publisher that emits before the object has changed.

items.name: var playbackRate: Float
items.desc: The current playback rate for the player.

items.name: var playbackStatus: MusicPlayer.PlaybackStatus
items.desc: The current playback status of the music player.

items.name: var repeatMode: MusicPlayer.RepeatMode?
items.desc: The current repeat mode of the music player.

items.name: var shuffleMode: MusicPlayer.ShuffleMode?
items.desc: The current shuffle mode of the music player.

items.name: typealias ObjectWillChangePublisher
items.desc: The type of publisher that emits before the object has changed.
